column1: Scenario

A ship named XYZ, during its operational cycle, has initiated condition-based inspections of shock mounts for various pumps and gas turbines. Some shock mount readings are approaching the warning threshold. The ship is scheduled to embark on a voyage within the next 48 hours, with an anticipated operational duration of 7 days. It's imperative to replace these shock mounts promptly to maintain mission reliability at 0.9.
